properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "#135" or ProcessCommandLine contains "RunHTMLApplication") and (ProcessCommandLine contains "\\..\\" and ProcessCommandLine contains "mshtml")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of commands that leverage the "mshtml.dll" RunHTMLApplication export to run arbitrary code via different protocol handlers (vbscript, javascript, file, http...)
